description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for user management in an admin section of a mobile app. It includes UI components such as app bar, header, and list items with placeholders for features like user list, role assignment, and activity logs.

classes.name: AdminUsersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the user management screen accessible to admin users.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A custom stateless widget for rendering section headers with gradient background and icon.

classes.name: _Lined
classes.description: A custom stateless widget for rendering list items with icon and styled text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the screen, including app bar and list of options.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the header UI with gradient background, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Lined.build
methods.description: Builds a list item with icon and descriptive text.
